question: Which of the following clearly defines the term "Privy Purse"?
option1: Payments made ruler of princely states after integration
option2: Natural disaster management fund of Princely states
option3: Fund created for war related matters
option4: A fund from which the salary of the officials of the princely state were paid
answer: Payments made ruler of princely states after integration
explanation: Privy Purse was the payments made ruler of princely states after integration. It was actually paid to the royal families of the princely states after the signing of an agreement of integration with India
